website_summaries.verdict: A solid if unexceptional entry-level dSLR, the Nikon D3200 should still please most folks looking for an upgrade from their point-and-shoots.
pros: With reasonably fast performance and very good photo quality, the Nikon D3200 delivers what you expect from a dSLR
cons: The camera's lackluster feature set, some underwhelming design changes, and photos that don't necessarily surpass its predecessor may disappoint

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I recently needed to replace my old D80. I'd had it for the better part of a decade and after thousands of pictures, it was showing its age. The D3200 is slightly smaller and has more than twice the megapixels. The images are sharp and crisp outside. Inside, spend a little and buy a speed light to ensure crisp, sharp photos. There's even a guide setting on the camera that allows the user to use presets for different conditions. This is a great entry level camera for someone getting started and for someone like me, who uses it constantly (and plays with all the bells, whistles, and filters) it's still a fabulous buy. It's a fantastic camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic DSLR Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. After researching the 3300 and 3400 Nikons, side by side with this one, the additional cost of the "newer" models for the changes in features just wasn't worth it. This is an outstanding DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Shilling

customer_reviews.title: this seems to be an amazing camera so far
customer_reviews.text: In general, this seems to be an amazing camera so far. My issues are that the battery and charger that came with it seem to be off brands, and I get about 10 pictures before it dies. Also the first night I got it I got the dreaded shutter error, and it just kept shutting down on me. After scouring the internet, I realized the mirror was stuck up. After I fixed that with a q-tip it has worked great ever since. I bought my own lens for this, so I can't comment on the kit lens. In all, this is a great camera so far. Excellent entry level dslr.
customer_reviews.author: BirdY-Q

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: upgraded to the 3200 from the D70. like the vid capability. although I have AF lens it appears that the 3200 only functions with one of my lens. don't know why that is; will continue to work with the cam to see if this can be corrected or maybe it is something I'm not doing correctly. overall I like the cam.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Murrier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has produced some of the best pictures I have taken... coupled with the 28-300MM Nikon lens, this is my go to camera.... The way it handles it just feels right whether I'm going to do a train shoot, model shoot, whatever, this is the one I want with me...
customer_reviews.author: Corydon H.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and lens from Amazon whse deals!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera for novice to expert. Can be used as a point and shoot as you progress. Many affordable lenses. I like the 70-300 sigma, $140 whse deals for my all around favorite.and from Amazon warehouse deals I saved about $150.My wife and I have the same camera so we can share lenses. I ordered mine w 55-300 Nikor, alittle more expensive but the end result in pics is about identical
customer_reviews.author: BoobearTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Flawless condition. Packaging was very well done. Everything came in pristine condition I couldn't find a single scratch! Arrived quicker than expected. Super light as well. Image quality is better than my T5. Still learning the settings but it is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: D3200 is the best camera to start photography as a hobby
customer_reviews.text: D3200 is the best camera to start photography as a hobby. Lightweight, more power than a newbie needs and enough functions that the aspiring photog can grow into. Purchased for my younger brother this Christmas and he's taken to the craft and has no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for its Price
customer_reviews.text: Don't underestimate this product. This was my backup camera for my professional photography and I was able to not only take amazing pictures but I was also able to print beautiful poster size pictures later and they turned out really nicely. For the price, I highly suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: love this camera! exactly what i expected! ideal for getting back into digital photography without breaking the bank. when/if I upgrade, this will become my back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: JustBunny

customer_reviews.title: It is a powerhouse and a good starter camera for newbie photographers
customer_reviews.text: The 3200 has a special place in my heart. It is a powerhouse and a good starter camera for newbie photographers. You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Shots were over exposed - Easy to return.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure they have some good products... This camera body was over exposing my shots, I'm sure it was a sensor issue. Everything else on the unit worked perfectly. No issues on the return. Waiting for my refund to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. O'Brian

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived timely and was in excellent condition better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived timely and was in excellent condition better than anticipated. Item was practically new great product, very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great value! Takes awesome pictures for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dealy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.  Wish My Wife Would Use It.
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos and was huge hit with my wife. But she never uses it. All our photo's are taken with her iPhone,"because I always just have it". So I don't how great of a buy it was

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to try out my new camera. It is user friendly and the weight is comfortable. I was pleasently suprised with this camera and feel like there will be many amazing pictures to come.

customer_reviews.title: I'm more then happy. As an entry level DSLR the Nikon D3200 ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm more then happy. As an entry level DSLR the Nikon D3200 more then fits the bill. Great features easy to use and of course takes great pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Heck of a great camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a Nikon, that says it all. Superior performance and reliability!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHOICES, BEST PRICES
customer_reviews.text: ALWAYS A PLEASURE TO ORDER FROM AMAZON. BEST CHOICES, BEST PRICES, ON TIME, AND IT MAKES MY LIFE SO MUCH EASIER. THE NIKON D3200 IS just perfect, works like a charm, and price was amazing for what I got. Refurbished is just fine with me.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, I have Nikon D7000 and D7100 as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, I have Nikon D7000 and D7100 as well, and this is nearly as good. More controls are in the menu and the body is plastic, but as far as picture quality it's excellent. I bought this specifically as a 2nd camera for video, but find myself using it for stills more and more. It doesn't have an internal focus motor, so will only auto-focus with the newer Nikon lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Donkey

customer_reviews.title: As of know will not be able to say till i find out why it will not af
customer_reviews.text: Some reason it will not auto focus. Still trying to find out why

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. Professional family photos I can take myself! I bought a 50 mm lens to go with it. I expect it to last years and years

customer_reviews.text: My brother ordered this on my Amazon and he loves it. It is his first dslr and at a very good price. I recommend it if you want to get more serious about photography

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Delivered earlier than expected and in great condition. I love this camera. Takes awesome pictures and videos.

customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3200 as an upgrade for my D-40. So fart I cannot tell any difference in picture quality. I'm going to set the 3200 up again and hope to make it better.

customer_reviews.text: The camera had no flaws and was like new, came very nicely packaged. Camera also came with new battery, neck strap, charger, and cables. All in all definetly a very wonderful experience.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use!

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3200
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nikon D60 12MP. Love this new one. The pictures are very clear compared to the D60, as expected. I can also use my 18 -200mm lenses. It's great that Nikon has put the electronics for vibration reduction on the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: LRL11

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D3200
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly when I needed it, my Nikon D3200 is in perfect condition. Works like a dream and looks brand new. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: The last camera you would need to buy
customer_reviews.text: The last camera you would need to buy, until they change the technology to something completely new. Super camera, smooth action, feels great in hand. I bought a Nikon refurbished model, saved $100, indistinguishable from new. Highly intuitive controls, great big bright display. I use it with vintage Nikkor film lenses, mates perfectly across 40 years of technology.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beyda

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, is cheap, light and really powerfull, I recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: I just got camera.works great.it arrived in only 2 days.Camera came in great shape.works good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic....so pleased with this camera...Ultra sharp images and easy to use.....

customer_reviews.title: Use a different seller.
customer_reviews.text: Seller was trying to charge 25% restocking fee for this product, then changed it to 10% but won't return our calls. I don't recommend this seller, product was ok and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Bonavia

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started in the photography world, and several friends recommended this camera and they were right, I'm loving it so far.

product_meta.title: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera Body (Black)
product_meta.description: D3200's compact size and price fool you"packed inside this easy to use HD-SLR is serious Nikon power: a 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS sensor that excels in any light, EXPEED 3 image-processing for fast operation and creative in-camera effects, Full HD (1080p) movie recording, in-camera tutorials and much more. What does this mean for you? Simply stunning photos and videos in any setting. And now, with Nikon's optional Wireless Mobile Adapter, you can share those masterpieces instantly with your Smartphone or tablet
feature_bullets: 24.2 effective megapixels DX-format CMOS image sensor
Wide sensitivity range up to ISO 6400, expandable to ISO 12800
Comfortable live view shooting using a large, 3-inch LCD monitor
Simple and slim styling with reliable holding and superior operability
Full HD movie recording at 1,920 x 1,080/30p

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
